materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of statues at the Shwegyin Monastery in Rangoon, Burma. In the forefront of the photograph, there is a platform decorated with intricate motif carvings. There is a reclining Buddha statue on the platform, accompanied by twelve other statues of Buddha's devotees. A part of the building structure of the monastery can be seen in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Shwegyin Monastery, Rangoon
subject_terms_1: monasteries (built complexes) Buddhism statues Buddhas (visual works)
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Monasteries Statues Gautama Buddha
